title: Henley Long Sleeve Shirts for Men Waffle Thermal Fashion Casual Tee Shirt Three Button Pullover with Pocket
description: 【Premium Quality Materials】:This shirt is thermal yet light weighted without be heavy and cumbersome being made out of soft, stretchy performance fabric (5%spandex and 95%polyester) and is super comfortable to wear. It also has a hanger tag on the collar for an easy hang up. perfect for spring, fall and winter. This men's long sleeve shirt is an excellent choice for your closet

【Stylish Design】:This men's long sleeve shirt features a three-button mock neck, curved hem, ribbed knit collar and cuffs, left chest pocket with cross-trimmed stitching, curved hem for a modern touch, and ribbed knit collar and cuffs to ensure a comfortable, flattering fit. The ribbed knit collar and cuffs ensure a comfortable, flattering fit. This shirt is a classic style that will never go out of style

【Versatile Wear】:This men's long sleeve t-shirt features a criss-cross stitching left chest pocket that not only looks stylish, but also provides a convenient storage option. You can easily wear this lightweight shirt with casual or dress pants, jeans, or layer it under a jacket, blazer or trench coat for a relaxed or formal look

【Occasion】:This men's long sleeve t-shirt with pockets is suitable for any occasion, whether it's for daily wear, vacation, travel, school, work, business trips, parties and more. It is a great gift for your friends and family

【Care Instructions】:In order to keep this shirt in the best condition for a long time, we recommend using a washing machine in cold water. Before purchasing, please check the size chart to ensure a perfect fit. Choose comfortable, fashionable and high quality waffle men's long sleeve shirt
